#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
inline ll scan()
{
    char c = getchar_unlocked();
    register ll x = 0;
    bool neg=false;
    if(c=='-')
    {
        neg=true;
    }
    while(c<'0'||c>'9')
    {
        c=getchar_unlocked();
        
    }
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
    {
        x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-'0';
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    if(neg==false) return x;
    else if(neg==true) return -1*x;
}
inline void scanstr(char str[])
{
    register char c = 0;
    register int i = 0;
 
    while (c < 31)
        c = getchar_unlocked();
 
    while (c != ' ') {
        str[i] = c;
        c = getchar_unlocked();
        i = i + 1;
    }
 
    str[i] = '\0';
}
char s[4123456],ans[1123456];
bool cmp(char a,char b)
{
    return (int)a>(int)b;
}
int main()
{
    register ll i,j,k,l,m,n,p,q,x,y;
    n=scan();k=scan();
    //scanstr(s);
    cin>>s;
    int asc[26];
    for(i=0;i<26;i++)
    {
    	asc[i]=0;
    }
    for(i=0;i<k;i++)
    {
        //ans[i]='z';
        //memset(asc,0,sizeof(asc));
        ll maxf=-1;
        for(j=i;j<n;j+=k)
        {
            asc[s[j]-'a']++;
            //sort(asc,asc+26,cmp);
            
        }   
        for(m=0;m<26;m++)
        {
            if(maxf<asc[m])
            {
                maxf=asc[m];x=m;
            }
            asc[m]=0;
                //maxf=max(maxf,asc[i]);
        }
        ans[i]=(char)(x+97);
    }
    ans[k]='\0';
    cout<<ans;
    return 0;
}
